name: National Merit Scholarship
description: This scholarship is awarded to students with outstanding academic performance in their pre-university education. It aims to encourage talented individuals to pursue higher studies.
eligibility: Minimum 90% in 12th grade or equivalent exams.

name: Women in STEM Scholarship
description: This scholarship supports women aiming to pursue undergraduate degrees in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics (STEM) fields, promoting diversity in education.
eligibility: Female students enrolling in STEM-related programs.

name: Financial Aid for Underprivileged Students
description: This program offers financial assistance to economically disadvantaged students, enabling them to pursue undergraduate education without financial stress.
eligibility: Annual family income below $10,000 and proof of financial need.

name: International Students Excellence Scholarship
description: Designed for international students with exceptional academic records, this scholarship helps them pursue undergraduate studies at top institutions worldwide.
eligibility: Minimum 85% in high school and a valid admission offer from a recognized university.
